title: Mathematics Education Design to Bridge e-Learning Competency Gaps in Developing Countries

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Math education design applying an e-learning competency gap analysis framework in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the four types of e-learning competency gaps (design, production, tutorial, and community).
Learners can design math problem-solving strategies using smartphone-based simulation/VR tools.
Learners can demonstrate collaborative problem-solving skills in e-learning environments through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
